note.p: Sister of William Frederick Woodington (1806-93), sculptor and painter (ODNB). Let apartments in Sevenoaks, Kent.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archive: Public Record Office RG10/923/5/1), 1881 (RG11/624/85/5)
Warwickshire, England, Church of England baptisms, marriages, and burials, 1535–1812 (Ancestry.com, accessed 3 January 2018)
